text: Zhongshi Korean International School, now called Weihai Zhongshi International School (WZIS), is an international school in Weihai, China. WZIS was founded in 2006 by Moody Lee, a Korean businessman to serve students in China. WZIS is an English speaking international school that follows the UK and Cambridge International Examinations (CIE) curricula. ==References== Category:Schools in Shandong
title: Zhongshi Korean International School
